subject: Re: My box is here and set up
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi April,

Happy Holidays to you and yours!
Well, I don't have a Mini Box (yet, maybe Santa will drop one down my 
chimney..???) but I am working on a "Micro Box" proto.  I think raw 
audio generation is the next component to be added... I have a couple 
of switches that I haven't used yet and some additional open space.

Wonder what I'm talking about...?? A quick trip to my blog will show 
& tell.
http://www.ufogeek.com

- Mike

---------------------------
Radio Shack Hack videos at:
http://www.ufogeek.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Slaughter" <aprilrebuilt@...> 
wrote:
>
> My husband I are proud owners of a MiniBox. The #3 Prototype. It 
will
> be fitted with one of Ron's new boards after the first of the year.
> While the box is #3, I am nowhere on the beloved list of '30 worthy
> souls' to use the technology, yet it works just fine for me. 
> 
> How many people on the board have a Mini now? :)
>
